segments.text: I notice the boy stretching his arm into the cookie jar, trying to grab as many as he can.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His stool looks like it's about to tip over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a sense of urgency, wanting to warn him to be careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is standing nearby, her eyes fixed on the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems to be his accomplice, waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they've done this before, sneaking cookies when the adult is distracted.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still drying dishes, completely unaware of the children's mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit frustrated that she's not paying attention to what's happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water from the sink is still overflowing, adding to the potential hazards in the room.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they all realize the risks before something bad happens.
segments.speaker: PAR
